  • Method Details

    • createConsumer

      public VfsIngressConsumer createConsumer(org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject ingressPath, Function<org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject,String> groupingFunction, Function<VfsIngressConsumer.IngressGroup,Boolean> groupValidator) throws org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException
      Creates a VFS consumer with the specified configuration.
      Parameters:
      ingressPath - The path where ingress files are located.
      groupingFunction - A function to group files within the VFS consumer.
      groupValidator - A function to validate the created groups.
      Returns:
      A configured VfsIngressConsumer instance.
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException - If there is an error creating the consumer.

    • resolveFile

      public org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject resolveFile(String path) throws org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException
      Resolves a file path to a FileObject.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to resolve.
      Returns:
      The resolved FileObject.
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException - If there is an error during resolution.

    • validateAndCreateDirectories

      public void validateAndCreateDirectories(org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject... directories) throws org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException
      Validates and creates directories if they do not already exist.
      Parameters:
      directories - The directories to validate and create.
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException - If there is an error creating the directories.

    • processFiles

      public UUID processFiles(VfsIngressConsumer consumer, org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject targetDirectory) throws org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException
      Processes files using the specified VFS consumer and saves results to the target directory.
      Parameters:
      consumer - The VFS consumer to use for processing files.
      targetDirectory - The directory where processed files will be stored.
      Returns:
      A UUID representing the session ID for the processing session.
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException - If there is an error during file processing.

    • fileExists

      public boolean fileExists(org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileObject file) throws org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException
      Checks if a specified file exists.
      Parameters:
      file - The file to check for existence.
      Returns:
      True if the file exists; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.vfs2.FileSystemException - If there is an error accessing the file.
